DOC.brief_summary: Pelvic girdle low back pain common pregnancy , cause severe impairment 10 % woman . Our hypothesis offering acupuncture addition standard care would reduce pain impairment throughout pregnancy . 300 pregnant woman 5 maternity unit randomize 3 year period receive standard care standard care plus acupuncture . Main outcome number day pregnancy maximum pain ≤ 4/10 . Secondary outcome compare group impairment score direct indirect cost .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Acupuncture Pelvic Low Back Pain Pregnancy ( Medical Economical Assessment )
DOC.detailed_description: Background . Pelvic low back pain ( PLBP ) affect 30 % pregnant woman week month , cause severe impairment 10 % woman . Standard treatment , base pain killer , postural recommendation , exercise , limited value . Previous trial show add acupuncture standard treatment reduces pain impairment short run . Hypothesis Providing acupuncture pregnant woman PLBP could reduce pain impairment throughout pregnancy , thus reduce direct indirect cot relate PLBP . Primary Outcome . Number % day pregnancy maximum pain ≤ 4/10 . Secondary Outcomes . Pain scale 4 week inclusion , mean Oswestry disability score inclusion delivery , direct cost related pregnancy care pain management , indirect cost related impairment throughout pregnancy immediate postpartum . Method . Multicenter randomize trial parallel group . Intervention : 5 acupuncture session 4 week , plus standard treatment . Controls : standard treatment . Analysis per pregnancy Follow : logbook keep patient plus analysis obstetrical record . Number patient : 300 Inclusion criterion : singleton uncomplicated 16-34 week pregnancy , PLBP > 4/10 Exclusion criterion Obstetrical complication PLBP , contra indication acupuncture , sciatica , maternal age < 18 , health insurance . Duration . Overall duration : 3 year 6 month , inclusion 3 year . Duration inclusion per patient : 2-26 week Number participate center 5
DOC.criteria: singleton uncomplicated 1634 week pregnancy , PLBP > 4/10 Obstetrical complication PLBP , contra indication acupuncture , sciatica maternal age < 18 health insurance .
